blogs.title: Want to Backdate a Git Commit on GitHub?
blogs.description: Learn how to create backdated Git commits with step-by-step guide. Master Git date manipulation, commit history editing, and best practices for version control.
blogs.excerpt: Have you ever found yourself in a situation where you needed to commit code with a specific date in the past? Maybe you forgot to commit your work from last week, or you're organizing your project history for better documentation.
blogs.author: Deepak Kumar
